title: Review: 661 EVO Womens Jacket packs comprehensive protection, locks into EVO Short
content:
Now that shuttles are back on the menu, my interest in downhill-appropriate protection has increased somewhat. It doesn’t need to be ultra-lightweight or ultra-breathable, because, well, I’m not pedaling up hills in it. Of course, it’s nice if it ticks those boxes too, but its primary function is to keep me as safe as possible

The post Review: 661 EVO Womens Jacket packs comprehensive protection, locks into EVO Short appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
